command.elements

Class GraphicElementCutCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • command.Command
      • command.elements.GraphicElementCommand
        • command.elements.GraphicElementCutCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphicElementClipboardEntryListener

    public class GraphicElementCutCommand
extends GraphicElementCommand
implements GraphicElementClipboardEntryListener
    Command which cuts the current selection to the clipboard.
    Author:
    geomaster

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private GraphicElementClipboardEntry entry
      Entry that was added to the clipboard.
      private GraphicCanvasView view
      Editor view.
      private boolean wasPasted
      Whether the cut content was pasted somewhere.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void doCommand()
      Copies the selected shapes to the clipboard, and makes them translucent in the editor view to signify their state.
      java.lang.String getCommandName()
      Gets the command name.
      boolean isRedoable()
      Returns true, as the user can always re-cut specific elements.
      boolean isUndoable()
      Returns whether the command is undoable.
      void onEntryEvicted()
      Called when the entry is evicted from the clipboard.
      void onEntryPasted()
      Called when the entry is pasted from the clipboard.
      void undoCommand()
      Undoes the cutting command by making the shapes non-translucent in the editor view.

    • Method Detail

      • doCommand

        public void doCommand()
        Copies the selected shapes to the clipboard, and makes them translucent in the editor view to signify their state.
        Specified by:
        doCommand in class Command

      • getCommandName

        public java.lang.String getCommandName()
        Gets the command name.
        Specified by:
        getCommandName in class GraphicElementCommand
        Returns:
        Command name

      • isUndoable

        public boolean isUndoable()
        Returns whether the command is undoable. The cut command itself is undoable if the content hasn't been pasted i.e. the shapes are still in 'limbo'.
        Overrides:
        isUndoable in class GraphicElementCommand
        Returns:
        true if the command is undoable and should count as part of the undo history

      • isRedoable

        public boolean isRedoable()
        Returns true, as the user can always re-cut specific elements.
        Overrides:
        isRedoable in class GraphicElementCommand
        Returns:
        true if the command is redoable and should count as part of the redo stack

      • undoCommand

        public void undoCommand()
        Undoes the cutting command by making the shapes non-translucent in the editor view.
        Overrides:
        undoCommand in class GraphicElementCommand

      • onEntryEvicted

        public void onEntryEvicted()
        Called when the entry is evicted from the clipboard. If this happens, the shapes are made non-translucent in the editor view, as this means the cut 'n' paste operation was aborted.
        Specified by:
        onEntryEvicted in interface GraphicElementClipboardEntryListener

      • onEntryPasted

        public void onEntryPasted()
        Called when the entry is pasted from the clipboard. When this happens, the cut 'n' paste operation was finished successfully, and the shapes are physically removed from the graphic element altogether.
        Specified by:
        onEntryPasted in interface GraphicElementClipboardEntryListener
